transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Sir very good afternoon. Main Alok baat kar raha hun India Mart se registration manager.
Customer: Sir abhi main busy hun sir busy hun.
Executive: Achcha kis time mein baat karun sir aap mujhe bata dijiye.
Customer: Nahi aaj to pura din to busy time hi nahi hai.
Executive: Sir thoda sa samay aap bata dijiye kyunki aapne ek feedback diya tha jo executive ne aap se baat ki thi na Khushi ne jo aapke account manager hai. To us pe aapne feedback diya tha to usi ke regarding ek bar baat karni thi sir ki.
Customer: Main aapko do teen din free nahi hun sir main.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Do teen din baat karo sir.
Executive: To sir main ye karun tha na abhi main close kar dun fir main teen din baad se kyunki mujhe bhi update karna hai sir already aapka ye wo baat free hai sir abhi abhi time kahan khatam hua hai sir.
Customer: Nahi time time khatam ho gaya kya mera?
Executive: Nahi nahi time to nahi khatam hua hai sir aap.
Customer: To fir.
Executive: Service thodi na sir main band kar rahe hain sir service to aapki chalu hi hai.
Customer: Main aapko call karta hun baad mein.
Executive: Theek theek hai sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is busy and does not have time.

Resolution:

- Executive offered to call after 2-3 days.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will call later.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- feedback, account manager, follow up
